item.title: [Python] Read table data in PDF file with Python
item.description: ## PDF data People in the world seem to love PDF, and even if they say they hate it, they have to deal with it. However, it is common for people to think that spending hours on it is a bit… In some cases, there is only PDF table data, but in such a case there was a very convenient library called tabula-py. Make a note. https://github.com/chezou/tabula-py Regarding tabula tabula is a Java library for extracting PDF tables.
